articles.title: Cody Bellinger got the worst pitch-clock violation of 2023 because Dodgers fans gave him a standing ovation - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Cody Bellinger didn't get into the box fast enough after acknowledging Dodgers fans.
articles.content:
